summary: Converts 'Marked' BAMs 5' reads to bigwig format for rampage-rna-seq pipeline

inputSpec.label: Input BAM file marked for Rampage

outputSpec.name: all_plus_bw

outputSpec.name: all_minus_bw
outputSpec.label: BigWig file for all 5' minus-stranded reads
